page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT IN CLOPHILL
page.content: There are not a great many people employed in{Clophill}itself. Most of the wage-earners commute to the local towns. We do however have several small businesses apart from{farming. The{timberyard}in Old Silsoe Road makes fences, pallets, sheds and other things to order. The shop in the former Chapel next door sells all kinds of{animal feed. Hilltop Farm has a pool for{swimming {lessons. We took a random survey of 100 homes & had 66 replies which showed that of our population MEN 15% WOMEN 26 % work in Clophill 35% 4\% Luton 9% 6 % Bedford 6% - London 3% 4\% elsewhere 7\% are unemployed. 4\% are retired.
